$.list
@js:json=[]
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
for(i in result){$=result[i]
		json.push(JSON.stringify({
				name: $.vod_name,
				author: name,
				kind: $.type_name+','+String($.vod_class).replace(/\s/g,',')+','+String($.vod_time).replace(/\s.*/,''),
				wordCount: $.vod_score+'分',
				lastChapter: String($.vod_duration).replace(/\[db\:时长\]/,''),
				intro: $.vod_content+p,
				coverUrl: $.vod_pic,
				bookUrl: '/api.php/provide/vod/?ac=detail&ids='+$.vod_id
			}))
	}
json

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[]
if(!baseUrl.match(/actress/)){
	list=java.getElements('title')
}else{
	re=java.getElements('.video_li')
	for(i in re){
		text=re[i].select('a')[1].text()
		href=re[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')
		tag1='🗓'+re[i].select('span')[0].text()+"  ❤️"+re[i].select('span')[1].text()+"  👁"+re[i].select('span')[2].text()
		list.push({text,href,tag1})
	}
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
$.list[0] @js: eval(String(source.bookSourceComment)) $=result JSON.stringify({ name: $.vod_name, author: name, kind: String($.vod_duration).replace(/\[db\:时长\]/,'')+','+$.type_name+','+String($.vod_class).replace(/\s/g,',')+','+String($.vod_time).replace(/\s.*/,''), wordCount: $.vod_score+'分', intro: '

'+$.vod_content+'

'+p+'

', coverUrl: $.vod_pic })
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
$.list
@js:json=[]
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
for(i in result){$=result[i]
		json.push(JSON.stringify({
				name: $.vod_name,
				author: name,
				kind: $.type_name+','+String($.vod_class).replace(/\s/g,',')+','+String($.vod_time).replace(/\s.*/,''),
				wordCount: $.vod_score+'分',
				lastChapter: String($.vod_duration).replace(/\[db\:时长\]/,''),
				intro: $.vod_content+p,
				coverUrl: $.vod_pic,
				bookUrl: '/api.php/provide/vod/?ac=detail&ids='+$.vod_id
			}))
	}
json
ruleExplore.name: $.name
